NAME

git-fsck-objects - Verifies the connectivity and validity of the objects in the database

SYNOPSIS

git fsck-objects …​

DESCRIPTION

This is a synonym for git-fsck[1]. Please refer to the documentation of that command.

GIT

Part of the git[1] suite
